document_data.name: Ranger
document_data.mainbody: '''Rangers''' were [[specialty priest]]s devoted to [[Gwaeron Windstrom]], the Master of Tracking.
document_data.Activities: Some of Gwaeron's rangers were selected to join the [[Fellowship of Stalkers of the Silent Path]] and enjoyed the use of several new abilities.
document_data.Abilities: All rangers were skilled hunters and trackers. They could cast the ''[[natural attunement]]'' [[spell]] several times per day depending on their skill level. They could also ''[[wind walk]]'' once per day.
document_data.Possessions: Rangers could use any weapon and wear any [[armor]], though most preferred to avoid anything heavier than [[studded leather]].
